longBusinessSummary: Elixxer Ltd. operates as a cannabis investment firm in Canada, Australia, Italy, Jamaica, and Switzerland. It focuses on invests in medical and specialty cannabis derived products in the pharmaceutical sector. The company was formerly known as LGC Capital Ltd. and changed its name to Elixxer Ltd. in August 2019. Elixxer Ltd. is based in Montreal, Canada.
